summary: This mod increases the density of all kind of grass in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to[/center]
[img]http://s16.postimage.org/78wcqokid/Screen_Shot142.jpg[/img]


[img]http://s12.postimage.org/5oqsd5p59/Screen_Shot136.jpg[/img]


[img]http://s8.postimage.org/nc2pmbz6t/Screen_Shot139.jpg[/img]


[img]http://s15.postimage.org/4jipysp9n/Screen_Shot140.jpg[/img]


* OVERVIEW *

This mod change the density of all kind of grass in Skyrim to the max

* FAQ *

Q: This mod may hit performances?
A: Yes, expecially on low range PC and Ultra Quality ENBs.

Q: What is the ENB configuration you used for screenshot?
A: A tweaked version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds ENB[/url]

* INSTALL *

Download, unpack in data folder and activate it trough the Menu Launcher.

* RECOMMENDATIONS *

I\'ll strongly recommend to download and use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288]OpticShooter\'s Lush Grass[/url] 
All the screenshot are take with that mod.


* UNISTALL *

Delete the files

* ENJOY *
author: MannyGT

files.name: Grass and Grass
files.changelogHtml:
Optimized version: all grass related to the water (like kelp) are reverted to vanilla
Improved performance near waters
